mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ibkct_salesmans_maintain WHERE first_level_client_name = #{firstLevelClientName} AND second_level_client_name = #{secondLevelClientName} AND business_type LIKE concat('%', #{businessType}, '%') AND (welfare IS NULL OR welfare LIKE concat('%', #{city}, '%')) AND welfare_operator LIKE concat('%', #{welfareHandler}, '%') ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(welfare), 1, 0),createdTime DESC LIMIT 0,1
